# Versions Docs

## Versioning

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/versions/index.md): This article explains how the .NET SDK and Runtime are versioned (similar to semantic versioning).
- [.NET version selection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/versions/selection.md): Learn how .NET automatically finds and chooses runtime versions for your program. Additionally, this article teaches you how to force a specific version.
